text: Oer-Erkenschwick is a town in Recklinghausen in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It is about 5 km northeast of Recklinghausen, on the northern edge of the Ruhr Area. About 31,000 people live there. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Recklinghausen (district)
title: Oer-Erkenschwick
